channel.title: How to make it so Npc can be attacked by to players or more (Boss) DeltaScape
channel.description:
I would like all players to be able to attack npc (a boss) but not 1v1.
I mean when someone attack it, another player can attack it too but right now, I can't.
How can I make this worked ?
Thanks.
BASE: DELTASCAPE.

item.title: How to make it so Npc can be attacked by to players or more (Boss) DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

So, I need to take the Coords of my Npc and put it on the multiCombat ?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it so Npc can be attacked by to players or more (Boss) DeltaScape
item.dc:creator: @UndeadPk508 UndeadPk508
item.description:
@UndeadPk508 wrote:

Im not spoon feeding you, i told you where to find the multicombat and thats all you should need.

Hint: [b]absX >= is CoordX

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it so Npc can be attacked by to players or more (Boss) DeltaScape

In this ? “public boolean multiCombat()”

Also, can you make a code with the Npc 1320 please ?
